net.gescobar.smppserver
Interface SmppSessionListener

public interface SmppSessionListener

Implemented to listen the creation and destroy of sessions.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 void created(SmppSession session)
          Called when a session is created.
 void destroyed(SmppSession session)
          Called when a session is destroyed.
 

Method Detail

created

void created(SmppSession session)
Called when a session is created. Notice that this doesn't means that the the session is bound, only that the connection was opened.

Parameters:
session - the SmppSession that was created.

destroyed

void destroyed(SmppSession session)
Called when a session is destroyed. Notice that this is not called when the session is unbound, it is called when the connection actually was disconnected.

Parameters:
session - the SmppSession¬†that was destroyed
